text: Alahad TV ( Alahad) is a satellite and terrestrial public broadcaster and television network in Iraq that was set up after 2009. It is an Arabic language network that serves upwards of 85% of Iraq's population. Al-Ahad TV is the television channel and media wing of Asa'ib Ahl al-Haq. The group is funded and trained by Iran's Quds Force.https://web.stanford.edu/group/mappingmilitants/cgi-bin/groups/view/143 ==Programs== *(Radar) - * (Kalam Wajeeh) - (Wajih Abbas) * (Zearra Mofajeaa) - * (Borej Moraqba) - * (Jeoo Seasi) - * (Masharee Moatala) - * (Dawaesh Altarekh) - * (Manbar Alhashed) * (Madaa Lao) - * (Salamtek) - * (Banorama Alahd) * (Abwab Motahara) * (Hakaya) * (Sabahkom Iraqi) * (Sawtak Masmoa) * (Alsaa Alakhbaria) * (Waqet Mostaqtaa) * (Betawqet Baghdad) ==See also== *Television in Iraq ==References== ==External links== * Category:Asa'ib Ahl al-Haq Category:Television stations in Iraq Category:Arab mass media Category:Arabic-language television stations Category:Television channels and stations established in 2010
title: Alahad TV
